author: Volodymyr Groysman
title: Building a New Ukraine
text:
Kiev 

In the Revolution of Dignity four years ago, Ukrainians claimed control of their own government. The situation was direâ€”the postrevolutionary authorities inherited a suppressed military in the face of an external aggressor, decrepit roads and infrastructure, inadequate health care, and an empty treasury. In addressing the challenge of transforming the country into a modern, democratic European state, in only a short period of time we stabilized the economy and have sustained two consecutive years of growth in gross...
